reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: OECS Multi-country Strategic Response Towards HIV/TB Elimination

description.narrative: Multicountry Caribbean MCC - TB/HIV - Organisation of Eastern Caribbean States - OECS. This program has the following goals: Reduce the incidence of HIV in accordance with the HIV 90-90-90 targets and achieve TB elimination in accordance with the TB elimination framework for low incidence countries (Linked to goal of Regional Strategic Framework). Services for HIV, TB and STI are sustained, strengthened, available and accessed by key affected populations in the OECS.. The objectives of this program are: To implement targeted evidenceâ€“based combination prevention strategies for key populations. To implement the TB elimination framework for low incidence countries to accelerate the elimination of TB in the OECS. To increase access to quality laboratory testing, screening and diagnosis for the clinical management of HIV and TB. To integrate TB control programs with HIV services to ensure that comprehensive, high quality care is provided for individuals co-infected with HIV and TB. To improve HIV/STI /TB surveillance system to increase the availability of data to support evidence-based planning, measure the impact of the response and the achievement of targets

title.narrative: Coverage / Output indicator for QRB-C-OECS
KP-other 21: Percentage of sex workers that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results (Grenada)

Treatment success rate- all forms: Percentage of TB cases, all forms, bacteriologically confirmed plus clinically diagnosed, successfully treated (cured plus treatment completed) among all TB cases registered for treatment during a specified period, new and relapse cases
KP-other 18: Percentage of sex workers reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services (St Kitts and Nevis)
KP-other 22: Percentage of sex workers that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results (St Kitts and Nevis)
KP-other 11: Percentage of MSM that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results (St Kitts and Nevis)
KP-other 4: Percentage of MSM reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services (Saint Lucia)
Percentage of people living with HIV currently receiving antiretroviral therapy
KP-other 13: Percentage of sex workers reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services (Antigua and Barbuda)
KP-other 9: Percentage of MSM that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results (Grenada)
KP-other 15: Percentage of sex workers reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services (Grenada)
KP-other 5: Percentage of MSM reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services (Saint Vincent and the Grenadines)
Percentage of HIV-positive new and relapse TB patients on ART during TB treatment
KP-other 24: Percentage of sex workers that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results (ST Vincent and the Grenadines)
KP-other 14: Percentage of sex workers reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services (Dominica)
Number of notified cases of all forms of TB (i.e. bacteriologically confirmed + clinically diagnosed), new and relapse cases
KP-other 1: Percentage of MSM reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services (Antigua and Barbuda)
KP-other 6: Percentage of MSM reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services (St. Kitts and Nevis)

Percentage of men who have sex with men that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results

Impact indicator for QRB-C-OECS
Percentage of sex workers who are living with HIV
TB mortality rate per 100,000 population
Percentage of men who have sex with men who are living with HIV
Outcome indicator for QRB-C-OECS
Percentage of adults and children with HIV, known to be on treatment 12 months after initiation of antiretroviral therapy
Percentage of sex workers reporting the use of a condom with their most recent client
Percentage of men reporting the use of a condom the last time they had anal sex with a male partner

TB treatment coverage: Percentage of new and relapse cases that were notified and treated among the estimated number of incident TB cases in the same year (all form of TB - bacteriologically confirmed plus clinically diagnosed)
